page.title: 14Biography Crosthwaite 'area'
page.content: {Nurse Bownass}is a{Community Nursing {Sister}who has lived in the area for 22 years.She has a long service medal for 21 years work in the community. She travels approximately 200 miles each week. On a{typical day }she starts at 9 a.m. with telephone calls and office work followed by injections for diabetics, midwifery patients and elderly people needing nursing assistance. This may be followed by routine checks of babies up to 5 years old at home and older children in schools.Her patients are referred to her by the doctor or through a relative or friend.{Nurse Bownass wears a blue uniform and carries a standard bag which contains instruments, bowls, dressings, syringes and any special equipment needed. Most equipment is disposable. The Nurse collects dolls as a hobby.
